SCHEMA: BUILDINGS¶

Description: The schema holds builing information. Additional schema details can be added here. This is a 2 line comment.

Additional Notes about this Schema¶

  • This schema is designed for specific purposes

BUILDINGS Schema Details¶

Table Name: LIFECYCLE_STAGE

Description: Lookup table that holds all of the lifecycle stages for a building.

Column Name Data Type Length Precision Scale Allows Nulls Description
lifecycle_stage_id integer   32 0 No  
value varchar 40     No The stage of a buildings lifecycle.

Table Name: USE

Description: Lookup table that holds all of the uses for a building. These uses are the same as those used in the Topo50 map series.

Column Name Data Type Length Precision Scale Allows Nulls Description
use_id integer   32 0 No  
value varchar 40     No The building use maintained for the Topo50 map series.

Table Name: BUILDINGS

Description: The building table maintains a unique identifier for a building. Over time a building can be represented by multiple building outlines aligned to different imagery sources. These building outlines are linked via the building_id.

Column Name Data Type Length Precision Scale Allows Nulls Description
building_id integer   32 0 No  
begin_lifespan date       No The date that the building was first captured in the system.
end_lifespan date       Yes The date that a building was either replaced or disused.

Table Name: BUILDING_OUTLINES

Description: The building table maintains a unique identifier for a building. Over time a building can be represented by multiple building outlines aligned to different imagery sources. These building outlines are linked via the building_id.

Column Name Data Type Length Precision Scale Allows Nulls Description
building_outline_id integer   32 0 No  
building_id integer   32 0 No Unique identifier for the building.
capture_method_id integer   32 0 No Unique identifier for the building blah blah blah second line of comment
capture_source_id integer   32 0 No Unique identifier for the building.
lifecycle_stage_id integer   32 0 No Unique identifier for the building.
suburb_locality_id integer   32 0 No Unique identifier for the building.
territorial_authority_id integer   32 0 No Unique identifier for the building.
begin_lifespan date       No The date that the building was first captured in the system.
shape geometry       No The geometry of the building.

Table Name: BUILDING_NAME

**Description: **

Column Name Data Type Length Precision Scale Allows Nulls Description
building_name_id integer   32 0 No  
building_id integer   32 0 No  
building_name varchar 250     No  
begin_lifespan date       No  
end_lifespan date       Yes  

Table Name: BUILDING_USE

**Description: **

Column Name Data Type Length Precision Scale Allows Nulls Description
building_use_id integer   32 0 No  
building_id integer   32 0 No  
use_id integer   32 0 No  
begin_lifespan date       No  
end_lifespan date       Yes  

Table Name: LIFECYCLE

**Description: **

Column Name Data Type Length Precision Scale Allows Nulls Description
lifecycle_id integer   32 0 No  
parent_building_id integer   32 0 No  
building_id integer   32 0 Yes
